mapper.select: SELECT H.HOT_NO, H.TITLE, H.CONTENT, H.FILENAME, H.RE_FILENAME, H.WRITE_DATE, H.WRITE, M.NICK_NAME, M.open_profile_url kakao, M.PROFILE_RE_NAME profile, L.count FROM HOTDOG H JOIN MEMBER M ON(H.WRITE = M.ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT count(*) count, hot_no from hotdog_like GROUP BY HOT_NO) L ON H.HOT_NO = L.hot_no WHERE H.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' AND M.NICK_NAME LIKE '%'||#{nick_name}||'%' ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT count(*) FROM HOTDOG H JOIN MEMBER M ON(H.WRITE = M.ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT count(*) count, hot_no from hotdog_like GROUP BY HOT_NO) L ON H.HOT_NO = L.hot_no WHERE H.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' AND M.NICK_NAME LIKE '%'||#{nick_name}||'%' ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT H.HOT_NO, H.TITLE, H.CONTENT, H.FILENAME, H.RE_FILENAME, H.WRITE_DATE, H.WRITE, M.NICK_NAME, M.open_profile_url kakao, M.PROFILE_RE_NAME profile, L.count FROM HOTDOG H JOIN MEMBER M ON(H.WRITE = M.ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT count(*) count, hot_no from hotdog_like GROUP BY HOT_NO) L ON H.HOT_NO = L.hot_no WHERE H.HOT_NO = #{hot_no}
